gcloud container clusters get-credentials placement --zone asia-south1-a --project magnetic-flare-349411 <- replace

kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/db-config.yaml
kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/db-secret.yaml 
kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/mysql-pv.yaml
kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/db.yaml
kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/backend.yaml 
kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/external.yaml

helm install filebeat ./ELK/filebeat/
helm install logstash ./ELK/logstash/
helm install elasticsearch ./ELK/elasticsearch/
helm install kibana ./ELK/kibana/

docker build -t jishnuvk/spe-main-project:front_end_latest ./frontend/
docker push jishnuvk/spe-main-project:front_end_latest
kubectl apply -f kubernetes-yaml/frontend.yaml 


kubectl create -f https://download.elastic.co/downloads/eck/2.2.0/crds.yaml
kubectl apply -f https://download.elastic.co/downloads/eck/2.2.0/operator.yaml

cd ELK/filebeat/
helm install filebeat .

cd ../logstash/
helm install logstash .

cd ../elasticsearch/
helm install elasticsearch .

cd ../kibana/
